attributes.action: No confidence in the government; call a general election in Sept 2019
attributes.additional_details:
All parties must be clear in what they are advocating in in this general election:
- Leave
- Remain
- Second Referendum with clearer options e.g. Leave with a deal, Leave without a deal, Remain with altered membership etc.
attributes.background:
We the people of the United Kingdom have no faith in the current government to lead us in this time of uncertainty and chaos caused by  'Brexit'. 

Let all parties put forward their stance on the issue clearly and allow the public to vote in a general election Sept 2019.
